Via Science.description: Via Science creates software applications that identify and prioritize risks to critical infrastructure using a combination of artificial intelligence, high-performance computing, and causal analytics. The company has expertise in solving large-scale, high-stakes challenges across critical infrastructure, particularly in the energy industry.

Vidyard.description: Vidyard is an online video platform for businesses that helps increase leads, accelerate pipeline, and delight customers. They offer AI-powered personalized video messages, video hosting, and analytics tools for sales and marketing teams.

Viral Nation.description: Viral Nation is a global leader in social media innovation, uniting powerful marketing services, proprietary technology, and creator representation. They offer end-to-end social marketing services, including influencer marketing, community management, paid performance, social experiential, and creative content.

Wealthsimple.description: Wealthsimple is a financial technology company that provides online investment management services. They offer robo-advisor services and investment management tools to help individuals manage their finances and investments.

Wiivv.description: Wiivv is a company that specializes in 3D-printed custom footwear and orthotics. They use advanced technology to create personalized insoles and footwear for improved comfort and support.

XIRIS.description: XIRIS specializes in machine vision systems and welding quality control solutions. They develop advanced imaging technologies for industrial applications, particularly in the welding industry.

Zoocasa.description: Zoocasa is a real estate website that provides users with comprehensive property listings, market data, and neighborhood information. It aims to empower Canadians with the resources and tools they need to make informed decisions about buying, selling, or renting a home.

Zoom.ai.description: Zoom.ai was an AI-powered productivity platform designed to automate tasks, streamline workflows, and improve employee efficiency. While the company's website is still active, it appears Zoom.ai ceased operations in early 2021.

airG.description: airG is a mobile technology company specializing in social entertainment and mobile content. They develop and operate mobile social networks, games, and apps for users around the world.

eBay Canada.description: eBay Canada is the Canadian division of eBay Inc., a global e-commerce leader connecting millions of buyers and sellers worldwide. It provides an online marketplace where individuals and businesses can buy and sell a wide variety of new and used goods.

eSentire.description: eSentire is a managed detection and response (MDR) company that provides cybersecurity services to protect organizations from cyber threats. It offers 24/7 threat monitoring, detection, and response capabilities to help businesses minimize risk and maintain business continuity.

iQmetrix.description: iQmetrix provides retail management solutions for the telecommunications industry. Their software platform helps wireless retailers manage sales, inventory, customer relationships, and other critical business processes.

wrnch.description: wrnch is a deep learning software company that develops and licenses tools and middleware for computer vision applications. Their AI software platform digitizes human motion and behavior from standard video using deep learning and human pose estimation. Founded in 2014, wrnch was acquired by Hinge Health in September 20213.

OMERS.description: OMERS (Ontario Municipal Employees Retirement System) is one of Canada's largest defined benefit pension plans. Founded in 1962, it provides retirement income for over half a million active, deferred, and retired Ontario municipal employees. OMERS invests globally in a diverse portfolio of high-quality assets to deliver on its pension promise48.

CGI.description: CGI is a Canadian multinational IT consulting and software development company headquartered in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. It provides a wide range of services including application services, business consulting, business process services, IT infrastructure services, IT outsourcing services, and systems integration services. CGI operates in over 40 countries with more than 95,000 employees.

Metrolinx.description: Metrolinx is a Crown agency responsible for managing and integrating road and public transportation in the Greater Toronto and Hamilton Area (GTHA). It operates GO Transit, UP Express, and PRESTO, while also overseeing major transit expansion projects across the region.

Scotiabank.description: Scotiabank is a leading international bank and a major financial services provider in Canada and the Americas. It offers a wide range of personal and commercial banking, wealth management, and investment banking services to individuals, businesses, and institutions.

WSP.description: WSP is a global professional services firm that unites engineering, advisory, and science-based expertise to shape communities and advance humanity. The company operates in over 50 countries, employing approximately 73,000 professionals across sectors such as Transportation & Infrastructure, Property & Buildings, Earth & Environment, Water, Power & Energy, and Mining & Metals.

KPMG.description: KPMG is a global network of professional firms providing Audit, Tax, and Advisory services. The company operates in over 143 countries and territories with more than 273,000 professionals. In Ottawa, Canada, KPMG offers a range of services including audit, tax, and advisory to both public and private sector organizations.

Ada.description: Ada is an AI customer service company that specializes in automating customer interactions for enterprises. Founded in 2016, it is headquartered in Toronto, Ontario.

Copperleaf Technologies Inc..description: Copperleaf Technologies Inc. is a company operating in the IT Services and IT Consulting industry. While specific details about the company are limited in the provided information, they have a presence in Ottawa, Canada

Northstrat.description: An employee-owned corporation providing strategic Information Technology (IT) and Engineering solutions to various U.S. Government agencies, including those in the Intelligence, Defense, and Law Enforcement communities.

RBC.description: Royal Bank of Canada, a major Canadian bank offering personal and commercial banking, wealth management services, insurance, investor services and capital markets products and services.

Fluid Biomed Inc..description: Medical device company focused on revolutionizing the treatment of vascular disease, developing the world's first hybrid polymer-metal, flow-diverting stent.

Mphasis.description: A global Information Technology solutions provider specializing in cloud and cognitive services, with a focus on digital transformation, AI, and quantum computing. Mphasis has expanded its presence in Canada, particularly in Calgary, Alberta, where it established a delivery center and Canadian headquarters. The company aims to create up to 1,000 technology jobs in Alberta over a few years, contributing to the region's growing tech ecosystem.
